content.raw:
@hoffman this pull request is now ready for your review.

Notably I've made the following changes:

* Updated docs / --help description
* Updated NEWS
* Genomedata archives are now space delimited (a somewhat significant code change in run.py)
* Merged default branch in

Tests have been run locally and pass.
